title: I don't like music
content: Since I was a little kid really, I have never had much of an interest in music. I never had a favorite band, a favorite genre, fav song, etc. For a short time when I was 17-20ish I did get into punk music, went to a few concerts/events, but I was still never the type to have music playing when I was alone. In fact, I can't think of a single time I have ever just turned on the radio/player for some music while I was sitting at home or on the computer. I don't own an iPod or anything similar, and I have no intention of ever getting anything like that. My last 3 cell phones have all had a built-in MP3 player, but I have never put a single song on them. Literally the only time I ever have music playing around me is when I'm driving a car, only then because the only other option is complete silence, which can get a little boring. I only listen to a rap radio station because it's catchy and I don't care enough to bring a cd or mp3 player with me. Whenever people ask me "What sort of music do you listen to?" and I reply "I don't listen to music" they look at me like I have two heads. Am I all alone reddit? Is anyone else out there a silence-o-phile?

title: I smell like cheese and I don't know why
content: As title says. I made a ghee and it was good for a couple of months but I noticed a mold in it, and that it started to smell like awesome cheese! Does my ghee turning into quasi-cheese mean that I didn't strain it well enough when I made it from butter?

title: My cats tounge is so rough
content: So I grew up with cats and I'm used to their cute little sandpaper tongues but the kitty I have now has the sharpest cat tongue I've ever encountered, she's 10 months old and I've had her since she was 6 weeks and it's been like that ever since she was little. I can handle her licking my hand but if she licks my arm or my face it hurts. I tried to Google but didn't see anything so I thought I'd ask here. Any one else ever had a cat with a super sharp tongue? Could it be like, overactive keratin or something? My boyfriend has also confirmed that she has a particularly sharp tongue so it's not just me who thinks so.
